metadata.name: Toxic Canister
metadata.description:
gm to the workshop of antiquities, experiments, and curses. The Crypt is a repository of forbidden items and dark knowledge, where myths and legends from ages past are kept under lock, key, and script.

There is a burden to the secrets lying within, both those familiar to mankind and those known only to the ether. 

Death is reanimated and darkness is summoned, 
so whatever it is you discover, new meaning is born here.
